pullRequest.title: Mapped most of the Entity Model classes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Copied most of the changes from 1.16.1+build.21. This package should now be on-par with that build.
Some of the mappings are deductions of my own.

commit.message: Mapped most of the Entity Model classes

nodes.bodyText: Why were all the methods moved above the inner classes?

nodes.bodyText: Not the shell, it's a very little part of the model. See images below (first is with this part visible, second not visible)
Wait you removed the file instead of just the field

commit.message:
Apparently this is anatomically correct, according to Haykam.

Included a JavaDoc for anyone who is not familiar with Turtle anatomy.
Mapped one (redundant, probably used for debug) field

Accept haykam's change: tail -> legs

Co-authored-by: haykam821 <24855774+haykam821@users.noreply.github.com>

Accept haykam's change: feet -> foot

Co-authored-by: haykam821 <24855774+haykam821@users.noreply.github.com>
